name: pensamiento-computacional-api-tests
description: API tests for Pensamiento Computacional using Newman

scripts.api:test: newman run postman/pc-api.postman_collection.json -e postman/local.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export postman/report.html --insecure
scripts.api:test:server: newman run postman/pc-api.postman_collection.json -e postman/server.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export postman/report.html --insecure
scripts.api:test:verbose: newman run postman/pc-api.postman_collection.json -e postman/local.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export postman/report.html --insecure --verbose

author: Senior Engineer
